task.title: ForgotPassword
task.shortdesc: This task defines the way to reset password, in case of the user forgetting their password.

taskbody.prereq: The user must have the active email Id or phone number that was provided while creating their account, incase they forgot their password.

step.cmd: Click on the forgot password link provided on the login page.
A new page will open, containing a textbox to enter the emailId or phone number for password recovery.
Enter the email Id or the phone number and click on the button "Reset Password".

An email containing the link to reset password, will be sent in the email provided, if it is the same email that was given at the time of account creation. Otherwise, an error message that the associated email is incorrect will appear

If a phone number was provided at the time of account creation for resetting the password. Then a link will be directly sent as a message on the phone number. The password can be reset by clicking on the link.

taskbody.result: The users should be able to reset their password, successfully upon clicking the link received in their email or phone number.
